column1: :oke etra petenna ? Alle da ? Nee entha alojikunad ? Njan povilla da...ninne vitt..mamem papem oke vitt...
:Sunnychayanem Baby auntyem oke vitt....njn enda ad orkanjad ?
:Sathyamalle njn paranjad ! Kalyanam kazhinja pnendayalum ivde nikan patilallo...ponam...evidekayalum...etra :doorathekayalum...
:Mathi....U r so Brutal...Enikad orkane patunilla...Patuoda enik ? ....Ninak Patuo ?....ann Unifestinu poya

:Orupakshe 2-3 kollam kzhnj amamchi prnjapole okath oru kochukurumabnokyayt ...Thadich veerth...mudi Bob oke :cheyth....4-5 suitcase pke ayt...Nedumbasseri vann erngum....apo samayandengi receive cheyan njn verum

:Ninak Thamasha......orkumbo onm vendayirunnu thonua....ee premum..ee kalyanum...allengi ...prakshin enne :premikan thoniya nerath ninakenne premichoodayiruno ?Ninakenne kalyanam Kazhichoodayirunno ? Apo pne orikalum Piriyendi varumayirunilla namuk.........
:Ninne njan yathrayakunathinekal enik ishtam nee enne yathrayakunjath aan
:Ninak enne kananam enn thonumbol nee ninde kannugal melle adakuga.oru hrudayamidipin doorathinapuram apol njan ninde arigilundagum
:Marakkano.. Pazhayathokke njan marakkano endokkeya njn marakkande
:Njanennum ivide irunnu Karuthamme orthu urakke urakke padum paadi paadi chanku potti chavum
:Rajumon orikkal ennodu chodhichu uncleinte father arannu
